allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Configure GitHub Pages deployment

- Add base path configuration for GitHub Pages in vite.config.ts
- Add deploy scripts to package.json with gh-pages dependency
- Create GitHub Actions workflow for automatic deployment on push to main

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(echo "# Supabase Configuration
# Copy this file to .env.local and fill in your actual values

# Get these from: https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/_/settings/api
VITE_SUPABASE_URL=https://your-project-id.supabase.co
VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=your-anon-key-here")

Bash(node -e 'const fs = require(""fs""); const content = `name: Deploy to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

concurrency:
  group: ""pages""
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ""20""
          cache: ""npm""

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Build
        run: npm run build
        env:
          VITE_SUPABASE_URL: \${{ secrets.VITE_SUPABASE_URL }}
          VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: \${{ secrets.VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY }}

      - name: Setup Pages
        uses: actions/configure-pages@v4

      - name: Upload artifact
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: ./dist

  deploy:
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: \${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
`; fs.writeFileSync("".github/workflows/deploy.yml"", content); console.log(""done"");')

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Supabase env vars to deploy workflow and enable network access

- Add VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY secrets to GitHub Actions build
- Enable host: true in vite config for mobile device testing

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix asset paths for GitHub Pages deployment

- Change absolute paths to relative paths for manifest, icons, and service worker
- Fixes blank page issue when deployed to GitHub Pages subdirectory

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
